name: Sandwich Empire: Undercover War
description:
Build your Own Sandwich Empire! Plant your sandwiches and help the Police find the real sandwich Lords!
Sell your sandwiches and grow your business for some inside information! Simply add water to your seeds and wait the sandwich plants grow.

Features:
- Funny Characters
- Simple and addictive Gameplay
- Several types of plants
- Crazy challenges

Enjoy while it's FREE!

Disclaimer:
This game is about an undercover cop who infiltrates the sandwich trafficking world to stop crime, it contains references to consumption of sandwiches use and is rated 17+. The creators of this game don't promote the production or consumption of any kind of sandwich.
